titleStmt.title: The two covenants from Sinai, and Sion, drawn up catechetically, and plainly. Together with a briefe appendix, directing about the use of the new covenant in a practicall way. Published for the benefit especially of the inhabitants of Eastham, Essex. / By Samuel Slater.
titleStmt.author: Slater, Samuel, d. 1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.S. for Henry Overton in Popes head Alley,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf bears a permission to print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
